data.title: I LOVE JUVENTUS!!!
data.text:
VICTORY!!!

Mood: happy

Juve have won their Champions League match against Bruges. The goals were scored by Pavel Nedved (from a free kick) and David Trezeguet, who has now scored 100 goals with Juventus.

And here they are...
